title: Crime Alert 06.11.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.11.19
description:
Man walks free for 30 years after killing his wife. Genealogy helps to solve a cold case. Law enforcement deaths rise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
